Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from a group of 4-5 individuals (only one of which showed any red on throat) perched 5-7m up in crowns of deciduous woodland. Playback had drawn them in from quite a distance. Very icterid-like in voice and behavior, but also reminiscent of Sericossypha in being vocal and moving in a group.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
